section_3_1_orchestrator_registration.query: SELECT job_id, job_name, job_type, schedule, owner_ec, enabled FROM fhq_governance.orchestrator_jobs WHERE job_type = 'PRICE_INGEST_CONTINUOUS'

section_3_2_liveness_proof.query: SELECT job_id, MAX(run_timestamp) AS last_run FROM fhq_governance.orchestrator_job_runs GROUP BY job_id

scheduled_tasks.query: SELECT * FROM fhq_governance.scheduled_tasks WHERE task_type ILIKE '%price%' OR action_type ILIKE '%ingest%'

orchestrator_cycles.description: Tracks orchestrator execution cycles, not job definitions
